vulnerability_findings.name: Time dependency bug
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(acc.balance >= MinSum && acc.balance >= _am && now > acc.unlockTime, "Invalid operation");

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: msg in Log.AddMessage (patch_3.sol#55) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-builtin
vulnerability_findings.message: Log.AddMessage.msg (local variable @ patch_3.sol#55) shadows built-in symbol "msg"
